CustomField.description: The status NPSP uses when it creates a Campaign Member for this Opportunity's Primary Contact and Primary Campaign Source. Leave blank to default to a responded status for Closed/Won Opportunities, and a non-responded status for other Opportunities.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The status to use when creating a campaign member for this opportunity's primary contact and primary campaign source. Leave blank to default to an responded status for closed/won opportunities, and a non-responded status for other opportunities.
CustomField.label: Primary Contact Campaign Member Status
